name: slack-hubot-apigateway
author: UCSB Developers
description: ApiGateway Hubot (@apibot) for ucsbtech Slack workspace

scripts.dev: npm run generate && node index.js --adapter slack
scripts.generate: npm run clean && npm run create:environment && npm run append:adminUsers
scripts.append:adminUsers:
echo '

# hubot slack admins (autogenerated via input from admins.txt)' >> .env.generated && echo HUBOT_AUTH_ADMIN=$(cat admins.txt | sed '/^[[:space:]]*#/d;/^[[:space:]]*$/d;s/[[:space:]]*#.*$//;s/[[:space:]]//g' | paste -s -d ',' -) >> .env.generated
